column4: and even then it fails at being quick, so he might as well use compiz
Meh, don't like complex editors as vi. nano and gedit are my favorites.
vi isn't complex, but use whatever you are most comfortable with
then why do you have it?
i use a minimal iso install and only install what i want. the default install is very bloated
Maybe it came defaultly. I don't need empathy either, but i knew i don't need it at least
Meh, default is a good enough for me
ok, if you can deal with all the bloat and unneeded services and updates that you don't even know what they are
